feed.title: Category: Git | 范琪的个人博客

entry.title: Git Commands
entry.content:
A simple command-line tutorial

Git global settings: git config --global user.name "fanqi" git config --global user.email "oschina@fanqi.xyz" Create git repository: mkdir lportal-ce-6.2.5-ace-1.3.5-unstyled-velocity-theme cd lportal-ce-6.2.5-ace-1.3.5-unstyled-velocity-theme git init touch README.md git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" git remote add origin https://git.oschina.net/imfanqi/lportal-ce-6.2.5-ace-1.3.5-unstyled-velocity-theme.git git push -u origin master Existing project? cd existing_git_repo git remote add origin https://git.oschina.net/imfanqi/lportal-ce-6.2.5-ace-1.3.5-unstyled-velocity-theme.git git push -u origin master
